description: This table stores reading physician information for imaging procedures.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of reading radiologists for an order.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The reading radiologist for the order.

columns.name: READING_DT
columns.description: The date that the study was read by the reading radiologist (PROV_ID) -- i.e., the date that the radiologist performed any action on the study.

columns.name: READ_PHYS_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reading physician roles category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Radiology


Cardiology


Ophthalmology


Obstetrics


Test Supervisor


ECG Reader


Echo Reader


SPECT Reader

columns.name: READING_RESIDENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the resident being supervised by the reading radiologist, if one exists.

columns.name: READ_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time in UTC format when the reading physician made a change to the study.
